msg_search: Search a product by name or brand:
msg_scan_product: Scan the barcode to find or add a product:
msg_description: Open Beauty Facts gathers information and data on beauty products from around the world in a free and open database.
msg_please_login: Sign-in to add products or edit product pages.
msg_register: No account yet? Create an account
msg_language_info: Searching will return in priority products in the selected language, and products you add will be added to the corresponding version of Open Beauty Facts.
msg_upload_problem: The image could not be sent
msg_loading_product: Loading product from the Open Beauty Facts database
